name: Diced (YaHUB)
description:
Minimal puzzle game. Place random dice and avoid patterns of 3.

  • 3 Colors
  • 3 Same numbers

Dice you can't see still counts so don't forget them.

Controls:

Mouse: 

  • Left click: build
  • Right hold and drag: rotate view
  • Wheel: zoom

Keyboard:

  • WSAD and arrows: movement
